content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. Can I start by getting your name, please?
Thanks, Bill! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we can serve your location?
Thank you! Let me quickly verify if your address is within our service area.
reason: Unable to verify service area—need operator assistance.

content: Hi Bill, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay—sometimes our automated system has trouble checking addresses. You’re definitely within our service area at 432 Parkwood Dr. What kind of HVAC issue can we help you with today?
Great, thanks Edgar! My AC isn’t cooling at all, and it’s getting pretty warm in here.
Thanks for letting me know! We can get someone out to look at your AC today. Do you have a time that works best for you?
If someone could come by this afternoon, that would be perfect.
Absolutely, we have a window between 2pm and 5pm open today. I’ll go ahead and confirm that for you. Our tech will give you a call when they’re on the way. See you then, Bill!
reason: Appointment booked by operator after system block.
